text: 10:17 Ofa Gami 6:24-26“Manmagh amizɨ ia Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Purirpenim avɨnizir dɨvazimɨn aven, arazir kuraba gɨn amadir ofan kamɨn asɨzir tuzim aman aghua? Kar ofan Ikiavɨra Itir God ua baghavɨra mɨsevezim, egha a ia ganɨngi, ia gumazamizibar osɨmtɨziba akɨrɨva, men arazir kuraba gɨn amangɨsɨ anemam.
